text: Thomas William Sexton (March 14, 1865 – February 8, 1934) was a Major League Baseball player. He played twelve games for the Milwaukee Brewers of the Union Association in 1884. He played from 1883-1887 in the Northwestern League. ==Sources== Category:Major League Baseball shortstops Category:Milwaukee Brewers (UA) players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Illinois Category:Milwaukee Brewers (minor league) players Category:Quincy Quincys players Category:Binghamton Bingoes players Category:Toledo Avengers players Category:Duluth Freezers players Category:1865 births Category:1934 deaths
title: Tom Sexton (baseball)
